text.div:
Narrativa gerada: ConceptMap ConceptMapPhysicalActivityToSNOMED

Mapeamento de (não especificado) para (não especificado)


Grupo 1 Mapeamento de iOS Physical Activity CodeSystem to SNOMED CT (all versions)

Código fonteRelacionamentoCódigo de destinoComentário
walkingis equivalent to129006008 (Walking (observable entity))Direct mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.walking to SNOMED CT. Includes both indoor and outdoor walking activities.
runningis equivalent to229065009 (Running (observable entity))Direct mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.running to SNOMED CT. Includes both indoor and outdoor running activities.
cyclingis equivalent to266940006 (Cycling (regime/therapy))Direct mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.cycling to SNOMED CT. Includes outdoor cycling and stationary cycling.
swimmingis equivalent to266938001 (Swimming (regime/therapy))Direct mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.swimming to SNOMED CT. Includes pool and open water swimming.
hikingis equivalent to71537002 (Hiking (physical activity))Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.hiking to SNOMED CT code 71537002. Note: SNOMED code should be verified via official SNOMED CT Browser before clinical use.
yogamaps to wider concept48761009 (Regular exercise (regime/therapy))HKWorkoutActivityType.yoga maps to broader SNOMED concept 'Regular exercise'. Specific SNOMED code for yoga may exist but requires verification. Equivalence marked as 'wider' because target concept is less specific than source.
dancingmaps to wider concept48761009 (Regular exercise (regime/therapy))HKWorkoutActivityType.dance/socialDance maps to broader SNOMED concept 'Regular exercise'. Specific SNOMED code for dancing may exist (search: 'dancing' in SNOMED CT Browser).
strength-trainingnarrower229070001 (Exercise training (regime/therapy))HKWorkoutActivityType.traditionalStrengthTraining maps to broader SNOMED concept 'Exercise training'. Target is less specific than source (which specifies strength/resistance training).
tennisis equivalent to85098004 (Tennis (physical activity))Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.tennis to SNOMED CT code 85098004. Note: SNOMED code should be verified via official SNOMED CT Browser.
badminton(not mapped)No verified SNOMED CT code available for badminton as of 2025-11-22. Recommend searching SNOMED CT Browser or mapping to broader concept 'Racket sports' if available.
squash(not mapped)No verified SNOMED CT code available for squash as of 2025-11-22. Recommend searching SNOMED CT Browser or mapping to broader concept 'Racket sports'.
table-tennis(not mapped)No verified SNOMED CT code available for table tennis as of 2025-11-22. Recommend searching SNOMED CT Browser or mapping to broader concept 'Racket sports'.
socceris equivalent to81598007 (Football (physical activity))Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.soccer to SNOMED CT code 81598007 (Football). Note: SNOMED code should be verified. Regional terminology note: 'Football' in SNOMED may refer to soccer/association football.
basketballis equivalent to25999001 (Basketball (physical activity))Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.basketball to SNOMED CT code 25999001. Note: SNOMED code should be verified via official SNOMED CT Browser.
volleyball(not mapped)No verified SNOMED CT code available for volleyball as of 2025-11-22. Recommend searching SNOMED CT Browser or mapping to broader concept 'Team sports'.
tai-chiis equivalent to418818004 (Tai chi (regime/therapy))Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.taiChi to SNOMED CT code 418818004. Note: SNOMED code should be verified.
pilates(not mapped)No verified SNOMED CT code available for Pilates as of 2025-11-22. May map to broader concept 'Exercise training' or 'Mind-body therapy'.
rowingis equivalent to10335005 (Rowing (physical activity))Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.rowing to SNOMED CT code 10335005. Note: SNOMED code should be verified.
paddle-sportsmaps to wider concept48761009 (Regular exercise (regime/therapy))HKWorkoutActivityType.paddleSports (kayaking, canoeing) maps to broader SNOMED concept 'Regular exercise'. Specific codes for paddle sports may exist.
skiingis equivalent to71537001 (Skiing (physical activity))Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.downhillSkiing/crossCountrySkiing to SNOMED CT code 71537001. Note: SNOMED code should be verified. May need separate codes for downhill vs cross-country.
snowboarding(not mapped)No verified SNOMED CT code available for snowboarding as of 2025-11-22. Recommend searching SNOMED CT Browser or mapping to broader concept 'Winter sports'.
climbingis equivalent to15128009 (Climbing (physical activity))Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.climbing to SNOMED CT code 15128009. Note: SNOMED code should be verified.
golfis equivalent to49774004 (Golf (physical activity))Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.golf to SNOMED CT code 49774004. Note: SNOMED code should be verified.
ellipticalnarrower229070001 (Exercise training (regime/therapy))HKWorkoutActivityType.elliptical maps to broader SNOMED concept 'Exercise training'. Specific SNOMED code for elliptical trainer may not exist.
stairsnarrower15128009 (Climbing (physical activity))HKWorkoutActivityType.stairs/stairStepper maps to SNOMED concept 'Climbing'. Target is broader than source (stairs is a specific type of climbing activity).

name: ConceptMapPhysicalActivityToSNOMED
title: iOS Physical Activity to SNOMED CT Mapping
description: Operational ConceptMap for physical activity terminology translation. Enables runtime $translate operations for semantic interoperability between Apple HealthKit activity types and SNOMED CT standard terminology. Critical for iOS Health App data integration into EHR systems.
purpose: Provides semantic mappings from Apple HealthKit physical activity types (HKWorkoutActivityType) to standard SNOMED CT codes. Enables clinical decision support systems to interpret wearable device activity data using standardized terminology.

target.comment: Direct mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.walking to SNOMED CT. Includes both indoor and outdoor walking activities.
Direct mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.running to SNOMED CT. Includes both indoor and outdoor running activities.
Direct mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.cycling to SNOMED CT. Includes outdoor cycling and stationary cycling.
Direct mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.swimming to SNOMED CT. Includes pool and open water swimming.
Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.hiking to SNOMED CT code 71537002. Note: SNOMED code should be verified via official SNOMED CT Browser before clinical use.

HKWorkoutActivityType.yoga maps to broader SNOMED concept 'Regular exercise'. Specific SNOMED code for yoga may exist but requires verification. Equivalence marked as 'wider' because target concept is less specific than source.
HKWorkoutActivityType.dance/socialDance maps to broader SNOMED concept 'Regular exercise'. Specific SNOMED code for dancing may exist (search: 'dancing' in SNOMED CT Browser).
HKWorkoutActivityType.traditionalStrengthTraining maps to broader SNOMED concept 'Exercise training'. Target is less specific than source (which specifies strength/resistance training).
Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.tennis to SNOMED CT code 85098004. Note: SNOMED code should be verified via official SNOMED CT Browser.
No verified SNOMED CT code available for badminton as of 2025-11-22. Recommend searching SNOMED CT Browser or mapping to broader concept 'Racket sports' if available.
No verified SNOMED CT code available for squash as of 2025-11-22. Recommend searching SNOMED CT Browser or mapping to broader concept 'Racket sports'.
No verified SNOMED CT code available for table tennis as of 2025-11-22. Recommend searching SNOMED CT Browser or mapping to broader concept 'Racket sports'.

Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.soccer to SNOMED CT code 81598007 (Football). Note: SNOMED code should be verified. Regional terminology note: 'Football' in SNOMED may refer to soccer/association football.
Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.basketball to SNOMED CT code 25999001. Note: SNOMED code should be verified via official SNOMED CT Browser.
No verified SNOMED CT code available for volleyball as of 2025-11-22. Recommend searching SNOMED CT Browser or mapping to broader concept 'Team sports'.
Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.taiChi to SNOMED CT code 418818004. Note: SNOMED code should be verified.
No verified SNOMED CT code available for Pilates as of 2025-11-22. May map to broader concept 'Exercise training' or 'Mind-body therapy'.
Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.rowing to SNOMED CT code 10335005. Note: SNOMED code should be verified.
HKWorkoutActivityType.paddleSports (kayaking, canoeing) maps to broader SNOMED concept 'Regular exercise'. Specific codes for paddle sports may exist.
Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.downhillSkiing/crossCountrySkiing to SNOMED CT code 71537001. Note: SNOMED code should be verified. May need separate codes for downhill vs cross-country.
No verified SNOMED CT code available for snowboarding as of 2025-11-22. Recommend searching SNOMED CT Browser or mapping to broader concept 'Winter sports'.
Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.climbing to SNOMED CT code 15128009. Note: SNOMED code should be verified.
Mapping from HKWorkoutActivityType.golf to SNOMED CT code 49774004. Note: SNOMED code should be verified.
HKWorkoutActivityType.elliptical maps to broader SNOMED concept 'Exercise training'. Specific SNOMED code for elliptical trainer may not exist.
HKWorkoutActivityType.stairs/stairStepper maps to SNOMED concept 'Climbing'. Target is broader than source (stairs is a specific type of climbing activity).
